ygData.subject: RE: NPC Bard in Rathe Mt
ygData.msgSnippet: The talk around our guild has been that this sash is part of the Fiery Avenger quest for paladins Entirely speculation, of course Sarah Heacock
ygData.messageBody:
The talk around our guild has been that this sash is part of the
Fiery Avenger quest for paladins

Entirely speculation, of course

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 14 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 19 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 10 Meditating! HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek
Ro (West Commons)

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Sylly Songsynger [mailto:jgs@...]
>Sent: Friday, February 25, 2000 9:04 AM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] NPC Bard in Rathe Mt
>
>
>From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
>
>Oh really?
>
>I looted one of these - at least I think we are talking about the same
>thing:
>
>A burnt sash - LORE ITEM NO DROP - WT 0.5 - none/none
>
>Off a an imp - I think - we were camping DB room and got trained or we
>pulled some from the way to the efreeti. Any how since it looked like the
>FBSS, I looted it and still have it.
>
>Hmm a bard that selos thru Rathe Mts? Guess i will need to go have a
>look-see.
>
>Sylly
>
>p.s. looked at everlore and allakazhms - no listings except one
>reference as
>to a drop from him of this item posted 02-19-00
>
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: jay schultze <sartori69@...>
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Sent: Friday, February 25, 2000 4:42 AM
>Subject: [eqbards] NPC Bard in Rathe Mt
>
>
>> From: "jay schultze" <sartori69@...>
>>
>> hey gang =)
>>
>> I camped Efreeti tonight with some friends (1 efreet, million
>PHes *YAWN*)
>> and got a burning sash LORE/NO DROP ALL/ALL no stats from an imp
>protector.
>> I have no idea what this item is for, and i'm not sure if it's been added
>> recently (maybe as recent as the latest patch) because I haven't been to
>> efreeti in months.
>>
>> I told a friend about it and he said he has heard it may be part
>of a bard
>> quest. He referred me to another mutual acquaintance that is big into
>> questing. This person told me he saw an NPC bard zooming around Rathe Mt
>> yesterday using selo's (I've never ever seen an NPC bard using songs so I
>> don't really know what to think). He said the NPC said something about a
>> "burning" something or other and he thinks the sash may have something to
>do
>> with a quest (hopefuly) for bards. He also thinks this NPC was added as
>> recently as the latest patch.
>>
>> If anyone knows anything about this please post info - i'm sure
>the bardic
>> community would appreciate it.
>>
>> Sartori D'Elsiraad <Legion>
>> Bard of the 50th Chorus
>> Veeshan server
>
>
